insert into tb_score(course_id, student_id, usual_grade, final_grade, total_grade) VALUES
(#{item.courseId}, #{item.studentId},#{item.usualGrade},#{item.finalGrade},#{item.totalGrade})
mapper.select:
select course_name, tc.course_id, teacher_name, student_name, usual_grade, final_grade, total_grade from tb_score inner join tb_course tc on tb_score.course_id = tc.course_id inner join tb_teacher tt on tc.teacher_id = tt.teacher_id inner join tb_student ts on tb_score.student_id = ts.student_id
teacher_name like concat('%',#{teacherName},'%')
and course_name like concat('%',#{courseName},'%')
and student_name like concat('%',#{studentName},'%')
